prompt:
You are an expert linguist and NLP practitioner specializing in irony detection. Your task is to generate **10 high-quality examples** of ironic and non-ironic statements, with **5 ironic** and **5 non-ironic** examples across different contexts.

### **Output Format (JSON)**
Return **only** a valid JSON list in the following structure:

[
    {"text": "seeing ppl walking w/ crutches makes me really excited for the next 3 weeks of my life", "label": "ironic"},
    {"text": "look for the girl with the broken smile, ask her if she wants to stay while, and she will be loved. 💕🎵", "label": "non-ironic"},
    ...
]

generated_examples.text: I'm so happy that I'm getting more money every day! 🚀💸
generated_examples.label: ironic

generated_examples.text: It's raining cats and dogs outside today, but I still want to go out. ☠️💨
generated_examples.label: ironic

generated_examples.text: The new kid at school seems like such a fun person, even though they're not as outgoing as you might think. 🤔👥
generated_examples.label: ironic

generated_examples.text: I've been working on this project all day long, but I just can't seem to get it done. 😞😢
generated_examples.label: ironic

generated_examples.text: The weather report says it's going to rain tomorrow, but I'm already planning on going out. 🌡️🌧️
generated_examples.label: non-ironic

generated_examples.text: Everyone has their own opinion about this movie, and I don't care what anyone else thinks. 😊👍
generated_examples.label: non-ironic

generated_examples.text: The cat was sleeping peacefully inside the house, but suddenly, someone came over and woke him up. 😜😴
generated_examples.label: non-ironic

generated_examples.text: The sun was shining brightly today, but I decided to take a nap instead. 😆💤
generated_examples.label: non-ironic

generated_examples.text: My boss gave me a promotion, but I'm still feeling a bit nervous. 😱💼
generated_examples.label: non-ironic

prompt:

- 5 sentences are **ironic**.
- 5 sentences are **non-ironic**.

Return **only** a valid JSON list in the following structure:

[

    {"text": "look for the girl with the broken smile, ask her if she wants to stay while, and she will be loved. 💕🎵", "label": "non-ironic"},
    ...
]

generated_examples.text: The best part is when I get to work every day without feeling overwhelmed. 😎💼

generated_examples.text: It's hard not to feel jealous sometimes, especially when you're surrounded by friends who love you. 😁🌟
generated_examples.label: non-ironic

generated_examples.text: Every time I see someone with a smile on their face, it makes me think of how much they've accomplished. 🌟💡
generated_examples.label: non-ironic

generated_examples.text: I'm so grateful for the people around me who support me through thick and thin. 🙏👥
generated_examples.label: ironic

generated_examples.text: When I'm working out, I don't even notice how tired I am until it's too late. 🧘‍♀️🏋️‍♂️
